definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Climbing Peak Junji was a must for ancient people who traveled to Mt. Taishi of Mt. Songshan.
sentences.chinese: 古人遊訪嵩山太室，莫不以登峻極峯爲美談。

sentences.english: Her daring work behind the enemy lines is now legend.
sentences.chinese: 她在敵後的英勇鬥爭業跡現在已是傳奇美談。
